lead_paragraph: A 1-0 lead vanished as Edmonton scored three goals in the third period, sending the Islanders to their first loss after three victories to start a seven-game trip.

headline.print_headline: Islanders’ Winning Streak Ends in a Late Oilers Barrage
headline.main: Islanders’ Winning Streak Ends in a Late Oilers Barrage
